resources.string: Enter correct key above to extract message

This app was developed as a Digital Image processing course\'s semester project at NUST SEECS. Steganography is the practice of concealing a file, message, image, or video within another file, message, image, or video. To hide a text, simply select an image, enter the text to be hidden, along with key (later required to retrieve the text) in the encode screen. Decoding will require the modified image to be select, along with the pass key provided at the time of encoding.
